attributes.action: Disallow single judges to retain cases more than a year, & psychologically test.
attributes.additional_details: Every day we hear stories of shocking decisions made by single judges. A panel would better prevent very wrong harmful decisions being made on behalf of the child(ren). Many Judges make a decision about a parent in five minutes and base the case on little other than a feeling. A new Judge every twelve months would prevent childrens' entire childhoods being ruined by common attribution errors. Many judges simply cannot possess empathy. This is a sign of horrible cluster B personality disorders.
attributes.background: If the judge gets it wrong they'll stick by their guns. Fresh eyes will prevent this. More than one judge would be ideal as we are giving a lot of responsibility to one person who will make mistakes. Many judges present as having covert personality disorders. Please test them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for all court cases to be overseen by at least two judges, if that's what you'd like to happen.
